#include<iostream>
#include<cstdio>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
    int t;
    scanf("%d",&t);
    while(t--)
    {
        int n,a[10005]={0},b[10005]={0},minn;
        long long sum = 0;
        scanf("%d",&n);
        for(int i = 0; i < n; i ++)
        scanf("%d",&a[i]);
        for(int i = 0; i < n; i ++)
        {
            sum+=a[i];
            b[i]=sum/(i+1);
        }
        minn=b[0];
        for(int i = 0; i < n; i ++)
        if(minn > b[i])
        minn=b[i];
        printf("%d\n",minn);
    }
    return 0;
}
